thread.title: DPAC welcomes 'The Phantom of the Opera' and 'Les Miserables' for new season
thread.title_full: DPAC welcomes 'The Phantom of the Opera' and 'Les Miserables' for new season

title: DPAC welcomes 'The Phantom of the Opera' and 'Les Miserables' for new season
text:
DPAC welcomes 'The Phantom of the Opera' and 'Les Miserables' for new season Tags: Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters More on this SunTrust Broadway at DPAC 
Durham, N.C. — Officials with the Durham Performing Arts Center (DPAC) announced Saturday that big hits including "The Phantom of the Opera" and "Les Miserables" will make up the venue's 2017/2018 SunTrust Broadway season. 
Most of the shows, which come straight from stages in New York, were selected from the top-performing shows on Broadway right now. Others were made famous in London’s West End and in Australia during new tours. 
The new SunTrust Broadway season is named “Ten Great Years” to mark this season as the tenth year that New York's best Broadway shows were brought to the Triangle. 
“We’re really proud to announce this new season and our hats are off to the Nederlander organization in New York who have really delivered the hits,” said Bob Klaus, DPAC General Manager. “From Broadway’s recent top-ten shows to brand new national tours and international hits, our tenth season of SunTrust Broadway will be one of our best ever.” 
The full SunTrust Broadway schedule includes: Sept. 12-17. 2017: Circus 1903 Oct. 17-22, 2017: The Little Mermaid Oct. 31-Nov. 5, 2017: Love Never Dies Nov. 28-Dec. 3, 2017: School of Rock Jan. 2-7, 2018: On Your Feet! Jan. 30-Feb. 4, 2018: Les Miserables Feb. 28-Mar. 11, 2018 - The Phantom of the Opera April 3-8, 2018: The Color Purple May 1-6, 2018: Waitress 
Special package deals for season ticket holders (ranging from $20 to $60 a month) go on sale starting Feb. 11 at 7:30 p.m. More information about those tickets and about tickets for individual shows can be found online at suntrustbroadway.com . Credits
